task.summary: Default task
Error Fixes for things broken in last commits
Large performance optimizations
Refactored Themes to the config folder
Refactored Themes to the config folder
Removed blank space line between party members. This should fix issues with larger font scale making a smaller party list scale look weird.

Added Configuration GUI window -All settings are exposed via the configuration GUI except position of panels due to mouse control for positions.
Added New Theme: Desat -Desaturated version of the current default theme.
Version update for previous commit.
Added Default ImGui version for Player Stats
Removed backgrounds from all panels

Layout Engine Implemented
Currently Layouts are loaded via manually editing the file and reloading the addon. An in-game editor is currently being built for a WYSIWYG experience.

Implemented Layout Editor
/glam layout - Opens Layout Editor

Implemented Layout Editor
/glam layout - Opens Layout Editor
Epiphany moment: Figured out the config GUI issue with layout selection!!!
Epiphany moment: Figured out the config GUI issue with layout selection!!!

Fixed small errors in the new layout command.
Fixed issue with padding reverting when typing a value.
Resolved issue caused by missing Layouts directory

Per-Bar Dimension adjustments for party list.
Each bar has a length and girth setting which can be adjusted in-game.
Player Stats is currently all adjusted via 1 bar. Per-Bar adjustment and layout will be coming in a future update.
Bugfix: Target Bar scaling not applying properly in config window.

Removed Rendering of Party Members HP/MP/TP bars when in a different zone. In their place, the zone name will render.
This was both a functional change and an aesthetic change. It was rendering bars with incorrect data. (Rather than seeing the actual HP/MP/TP of party members in a different zone, it was random data.)

Added Text Colorization based on HP values.
2/3+ HP: White Text 1/2-2/3 HP: Yellow Text Less than 1/2 HP: Red Text
This is an approximation of blood agro adjustments. All text objects for a given player in the party list will adjust based on that player's HP values. While possible to restrict this to purely the HP text, I think it's more beneficial for all text for that player to reflect this.
Created awareness for chatlog expansion for party list. If chatlog is expanded, then the party list will temporarily be hidden.
Adjusted chatlog awareness to continue hiding party list until the chatlog is closed, even if the chat input bar is opened.
Adjusted chatlog awareness to continue hiding party list until the chatlog is closed, even if the chat input bar is opened.
Adjusted chatlog awareness to continue hiding party list until the chatlog is closed, even if the chat input bar is opened.
Adjusted chatlog awareness to continue hiding party list until the chatlog is closed, even if the chat input bar is opened.

Reimplemented Background to Party List
Background Opacity only configurable through config file for the time being.
Party Leader Indication Level Sync Indication Targeted Party Member Marker

Implemented Textured Background for Themes
Due to the method used to make this work, the background image will not move smoothly when adjusting the location of the party. Once in place, it will be fine.

Implemented Textured Background for Themes
Due to the method used to make this work, the background image will not move smoothly when adjusting the location of the party. Once in place, it will be fine.

Implemented Textured Background for Themes
Due to the method used to make this work, the background image will not move smoothly when adjusting the location of the party. Once in place, it will be fine.
Added missing texture to Desat
Custom Fonts Better Textured Backgrounds Indicators (Now in a working version!)
Custom Fonts Better Textured Backgrounds Indicators (Now in a working version!)

Inventory Panel Implemented to cover Default Party List.
Can be disabled via /glam config
Changing font or font size on the inventory panel will reload the entire addon. This is done as a temporary measure to avoid crashing the addons plugin while I search for a fix for the crash.
Fix for Crash on Zoning issue
Fixed Gil Crash on Zone and improper login screen issues.

Bug Fix: Pet not lined up properly with rest of party. Target Arrow not rendering on Pet.
Preparations for buff/debuff icons on party list. Not functional yet, but files and functions are starting to be added.

Bug Fix: Pet not lined up properly with rest of party. Target Arrow not rendering on Pet.
Preparations for buff/debuff icons on party list. Not functional yet, but files and functions are starting to be added.
Hiding of UI elements when opening /rmap, /cmap, /bmap, or /map.
Target Name reflecting claim, NPC, Mob, Anon, etc..
Reworked Fill Texture Adjustment for cleaner appearance.
Reworked Fill Texture Adjustment for cleaner appearance.
Reworked Fill Texture Adjustment for cleaner appearance.

Complete Rewrite from the Ground Up. Official Release of Version 1.0 Performance increases across the board. New Features: Party Member Buff Icons in Party list. Redesign of Alliance Panel Rework of Treasure Pool Lot Rendering for Alliance Panel Default In-Game Party list toggle (Hides rendering of default party list.) Completely redesigned Configuration GUI. Control of all settings moved to Configuration GUI. Element dimensions for party list moved into the Layout Files. Loading a different layout will change dimensions of elements. Party Invite Notification (Use /join or /decline to clear this notification for now.)
Fixed crash when toggling theming engine for Player Stats
Fixed crash when toggling theming engine for Player Stats
Fixed crash when toggling theming engine for Player Stats

MESSAGE.value:
Layout Engine Implemented
Currently Layouts are loaded via manually editing the file and reloading the addon. An in-game editor is currently being built for a WYSIWYG experience.

Implemented Layout Editor
/glam layout - Opens Layout Editor
Epiphany moment: Figured out the config GUI issue with layout selection!!!

Fixed small errors in the new layout command.
Fixed issue with padding reverting when typing a value.
Resolved issue caused by missing Layouts directory

Per-Bar Dimension adjustments for party list.
Each bar has a length and girth setting which can be adjusted in-game.
Player Stats is currently all adjusted via 1 bar. Per-Bar adjustment and layout will be coming in a future update.
Bugfix: Target Bar scaling not applying properly in config window.

Removed Rendering of Party Members HP/MP/TP bars when in a different zone. In their place, the zone name will render.
This was both a functional change and an aesthetic change. It was rendering bars with incorrect data. (Rather than seeing the actual HP/MP/TP of party members in a different zone, it was random data.)

Added Text Colorization based on HP values.
2/3+ HP: White Text 1/2-2/3 HP: Yellow Text Less than 1/2 HP: Red Text
This is an approximation of blood agro adjustments. All text objects for a given player in the party list will adjust based on that player's HP values. While possible to restrict this to purely the HP text, I think it's more beneficial for all text for that player to reflect this.
Created awareness for chatlog expansion for party list. If chatlog is expanded, then the party list will temporarily be hidden.
Adjusted chatlog awareness to continue hiding party list until the chatlog is closed, even if the chat input bar is opened.

Reimplemented Background to Party List
Background Opacity only configurable through config file for the time being.
Party Leader Indication Level Sync Indication Targeted Party Member Marker

Implemented Textured Background for Themes
Due to the method used to make this work, the background image will not move smoothly when adjusting the location of the party. Once in place, it will be fine.
Added missing texture to Desat
Custom Fonts Better Textured Backgrounds Indicators (Now in a working version!)

Inventory Panel Implemented to cover Default Party List.
Can be disabled via /glam config
Changing font or font size on the inventory panel will reload the entire addon. This is done as a temporary measure to avoid crashing the addons plugin while I search for a fix for the crash.
Fix for Crash on Zoning issue
Fixed Gil Crash on Zone and improper login screen issues.

Bug Fix: Pet not lined up properly with rest of party. Target Arrow not rendering on Pet.
Preparations for buff/debuff icons on party list. Not functional yet, but files and functions are starting to be added.
Hiding of UI elements when opening /rmap, /cmap, /bmap, or /map.
Target Name reflecting claim, NPC, Mob, Anon, etc..
Reworked Fill Texture Adjustment for cleaner appearance.

Complete Rewrite from the Ground Up. Official Release of Version 1.0 Performance increases across the board. New Features: Party Member Buff Icons in Party list. Redesign of Alliance Panel Rework of Treasure Pool Lot Rendering for Alliance Panel Default In-Game Party list toggle (Hides rendering of default party list.) Completely redesigned Configuration GUI. Control of all settings moved to Configuration GUI. Element dimensions for party list moved into the Layout Files. Loading a different layout will change dimensions of elements. Party Invite Notification (Use /join or /decline to clear this notification for now.)
Fixed crash when toggling theming engine for Player Stats
